title: 'Rat Garbage' returns: Mandel Nallo vs. Killys Mota booked for Bellator 231
text:
A lightweight bout between Mandel Nallo and Killys Mota is the latest addition to Bellator 231.

MMA Junkie on Friday confirmed the matchup between Nallo (7-0 MMA, 2-0 BMMA) and Mota (11-1 MMA, 0-0 BMMA) with a Bellator official.

Bellator 231 takes place Oct. 25 at Mohegan Sun Arena in Uncasville, Conn.

Nallo, nicknamed “Rat Garbage,” hasn’t fought since scoring a highlight-reel knockout of Carrington Banks at Bellator 207 in October 2018. He was scheduled to fight earlier this year, but was forced out due to injury.

Mota, meanwhile, is a two-fight LFA veteran who will make his Bellator debut on the card.

Also set for the Bellator 231 prelims is a welterweight fight between Jon Manley (12-6 MMA, 1-0 BMMA) and Thiago Oliveira (16-4 MMA, 0-0 BMMA).

The latest Bellator 231 lineup now includes:

MAIN CARD (Paramount, DAZN, 9 p.m. ET)

Frank Mir vs. Roy Nelson

Phil Davis vs. Karl Albrektsson

Jason Jackson vs. Ed Ruth

Bec Rawlings vs. Ilara Joanne

Jake Hager vs. Anthony Garrett

PRELIMINARY CARD (MMA Junkie, 6:45 p.m. ET)
